userFlows.name: Create List & Buy
steps: User opens app → Home screen
Tap + button → New List modal
Add items via text/voice/photo → Grocery List screen
Review list (12 items) → Tap Compare Prices
View optimal split (₹482, save ₹38) → Compare & Buy screen
Tap Buy from Optimal Split → Checkout modal
Confirm payment → Order confirmation
Orders appear in Order History → Done

userFlows.name: Auto-Reorder Opt-In
steps: User receives push notification: 'Rice running low in 3 days'
Tap notification → Home screen with AI Suggestions card
See 'Rice (3 days)' with Learn more link
Tap Learn more → Auto-reorder explainer modal
Toggle 'Enable auto-reorder for Rice' → Settings saved
48 hours before runout, receive notification: 'Rice will auto-order tomorrow'
User can cancel/snooze or do nothing
Order auto-executes → Confirmation toast

userFlows.name: Bill Capture
steps: User forwards grocery bill email to bills@myhome.app
System receives email → Extracts PDF attachment
OCR runs → Parses vendor, date, items, amounts
Fuzzy match items to product catalog
User opens app → Bills screen
See new bill: 'Oct 20 - Amazon ₹620 [Grocery]'
Tap bill → View PDF + extracted items
User can edit/confirm items → Save
Bill added to monthly spending chart
